features: Multi-task! Our Witch Hazel face toner absorbs trapped dirt and oil, purifying skin without stripping its natural moisture. Anti-inflammatory Vitamin B5 soothes your skin and stabilizes your skin's barrier. This anti aging facial toner fights the effects of aging, reduces blackheads, and shrinks pores, for smooth, unblemished skin. Non-Comedogenic.
Our toner for face is for all skin types, especially oily and acne prone skin. Use day & night after cleansing to remove the last traces of makeup, clear pores, & renew skin before moisturizing.
Key natural & organic ingredients include Witch Hazel, Kelp, Vitamin B5, and MSM. Cruelty free. Fragrance free. Made in USA with globally sourced ingredients.

We're all about providing truth and clarity in natural, effective skincare. In a crowded market with over-hyped “miracle ingredients”, we found most ingredients don't produce results. We drilled down to 8 key ingredients that generated the majority of the benefits for your skin: Our "Eight Saints".
Worry Free Return Policy: Try Eight Saints worry free with our 30 day return policy. If a product doesn't work for you, contact us and we'll happily refund you!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Step 1: Down to Earth Gel Face Wash Step 2: Coast is Clear Toner Step 3: Pep Rally Face Serum Step 4: All In Eye Cream Step 5: Chase the Sun SPF 30 Face Moisturizer How to Use Use 1-2 pumps of gel face cleanser. Add water to lather. Gently massage onto your face in an upward, circular motion. Splash with warm water to rinse. For optimal results use each morning and evening. Saturate a cotton pad and sweep over face, neck and under eyes. Alternatively, spritz 3 pumps onto palms and gently pat face for a midday refresh. After cleansing, smooth a few drops of this anti aging serum to face and neck until absorbed. Follow with moisturizer. Works well under makeup. Lightly dab the anti-aging eye cream under and around the eye area without pulling the skin until it has fully absorbed. Dispense a small amount into the palm of hand. Use fingertips to apply to face and neck. Retail 22.00 18.00 36.00 36.00 34.00 Key Benefits Cleansing Toning Anti-Aging Anti-Aging Hydration/Sun Protection Key Ingredients Vitamin C, Kaolin Clay, French Clay, & DMAE Vitamin B5, Witch Hazel, Seawater, & Kelp Green Tea, MSM, Hyaluronic Acid, & Vitamin C Squalane, MSM, Cocoa Butter, & Cucumber Hydrosol Zinc, Vitamin E, Hyaluronic Acid, & Squalane When to Use Morning and Evening Morning and Evening Morning Morning and Evening Morning Size 2 Ounces 6 Ounces 1 Ounce 0.5 Ounce 2 Ounces

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So I normally don’t leave reviews but I am just absolutely so in love with eight saints entire skin care, and anti-aging line that I absolutely have to share with everybody. This toner leaves my face feeling so hydrated. It’s amazing it’s unlike anything I’ve ever tried before I’ve never never had a toner leave my face feel hydrated, they usually, leave it feeling dry. I’ve tried many of eight saints products and their all natural products are so amazing. I seriously can’t say it enough , leave it feeling dry. I’ve tried many of eight saints products and they’re all natural products are so amazing. I seriously can’t say it enough. You must must try this if you want ALL NATURAL ingredients for your skin!!P.s. they have a very affordable trial kit with very fair size bottles of their anti-aging skin, care, line if anything else get yourself that you will seriously want to thank me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best toner for my sensitive skin!
reviews.reviewText: I am so glad I got a full size of this product and gave it a few weeks to see really glowing results! I had come across a sample size of it and noticed instantly that it was very good at cleaning debris from pores; but I could not judge much more about it than that. There was a pretty cool sale price in December on Amazon so I ordered a full sized bottle. I have now used the product everyday for 3.5 weeks…. INCREDIBLE!!!!CONVENIENT: It is great on its own as a quick on the go cleanse and moisturize, or to use as a daily toner. It is pretty necessary to use this product in the spray bottle that the full size comes in, it’s convenience really shines when it is in a spray bottle. It also seems to last forever, despite being liberal with my use for this period of time I have only made a dent about 1/5th of the bottle, I’m sure the sprayer helps with that, I hate it when you have to dab toners from a puddle in your hand or cotton swab. With the sprayer waste no product and no time! (Non-aerosol sprayer by the way, just the kind you push with your finger to get a spritz.)GENTLE: I have fairly sensitive skin. It varies according to season, weather, climate, my cycle, stress. I also admittedly sometimes over do it with products or exfoliating. December is high risk for sensitivity what with the weather changes, heaters on, and it was the most stressful December of my life to date in 2022 when I tried Eight Saints toner. The toner didn’t burn or tingle at all, not once. I wouldn’t alarmed but a mild burn after exfoliating but even so, this was a very gentle product for how much power it has! I can’t remember using a toner that didn’t burn at least sometimes, which is why I don’t often use toner. This duckling has imprinted to this toner…..CLEANSING: This was my original draw to this product, I noticed it dislodged some dirt from my pore on first contact without any side effects. My water barrier has stress related issues, no lies part of the problem is the Mississippi curse… due to this intergenerational stress combined with my own personal stresses, my skin doesnt always react to products the way it is “supposed” to, and I wouldn’t call it dry, oily, nor combo. I would call it flaky. Heh. Doesn’t matter how much water I drink or moisturizer I use sometimes. I get milia and my pores have trouble expelling wastes. This product works for me even with these issues! After a couple weeks with the toner applied every morning, I have had a lot less dirt coming out when I cleanse at night. It is also dramatic if you do have dirt in wiping it away. So it gets rid of dirt and keeps it that way!MOISTURIZING: I don’t think I ever expected a toner to moisturize, I expect it to strip everything and then I put moisturizer on top…. While I did use moisturizer most of the time with this toner, I didn’t have to! I noticed it can be used as an all in 1. I have no idea how, a rarity when it doesn’t seem very oily either… usually only an oil cleanser can do this but those make me breakout. Uniquely awesome that this product can cleanse and moisturize effectively and concurrently without unwanted results!SMELLS GREAT: the smell is pleasant and not harsh like toners can be. I’m not sure if it’s perfume or natural but it’s close enough to natural I can live and love it!I know I wrote this review in the style of many non-American producers that sell here on amazon…. I am American and just a regular 34 year old gal, I swear! White if that helps anyone imagine skin type….Just thought it would be more organized review this way, and I think the product is great so it warranted a good review. Thanks Eight Saints!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Seaweed toner
reviews.reviewText: I love this seaweed toner by Eight Saints. This is my second bottle. I use the face wash then I make sure my skin is clear and ready for my next product and this product definitely does the job. It contains witch hazel, vitamin B5, seawater and kelp. I can feel how clean my face feels everytime I use it. I am so happy with the result's. I will continue to use this product in my routine. Eight Saints is the product to use. I will definitely be a loyal customer and continue to purchase this is my go to toner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have been using eight saints for quite some time now. I have different toners I use religiously but decided to give this one a try. The first thing I really like is that it’s a spray bottle. Typically I shake the toner onto my hands and apply but I am digging the spray nozzle. The scent of the toner isn’t my favorite but certainly isn’t overwhelming. The benefits from the ingredients and the difference in my skin texture are what’s important to me. Oh, did I mention Eight Saints is all natural, not tested on animals and made in the USA??? I promise anything you try from this company, you will love!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love This Toner !
reviews.reviewText: This toner is light and refreshing. It keeps my skin soft. After using it within a week I have seen smoother, cleaner skin. The spray bottle works very well. I love Eight Saints because I can trust what they put into the products .
